HERO_TITLE:
Not by
code alone does a DEV live.
HERO_DESCRIPTION: Java Backend Specialist, philosopher in training, and international career mentor. My motto is to build the future on the shoulders of giants.
PHILOSOPHY_P1: This proverb, attributed to Isaac Newton, suggests that any success or knowledge we achieve is due to the people who came before us. This central idea highlights true humility, appreciation, and respect for the knowledge of others.
PHILOSOPHY_P2: I recognize that my achievements are the result of the foundations laid by those who came before me. I am a perpetual student, lover of classical philosophy, polyglot (Portuguese, English, Japanese, Latin, and Ancient Greek), and INTJ-A.
ROLE_SOFTWARE_ENGINEER_DESC: My specialty is Backend development on the Java platform. I focus on profitable solutions, performance, and robust architecture using Spring, Postgres, and REST APIs.
ROLE_MENTOR_DESC: I show through practical examples how to have an international career as a programmer and exceed 30k in monthly income. Positioning, skills, and English.
ROLE_ENTREPRENEUR_DESC: Founder of Simple Software. I opened my first company at 19. I learned in practice what it means to manage business and today I act in a light and strategic way.
ROLE_TEACHER_DESC: Total focus on conversation and real-life English. "Real English" for those who want to learn how to learn any language, without fluff.
ROLE_PHILOSOPHER_DESC: Philosophy student at Academia Atl√¢ntico. I seek classical knowledge to understand the foundations of human thought.
FAQ_A1: Robson Cassiano is a Senior Software Engineer specializing in Java Backend, an international career mentor, entrepreneur and founder of Simple Software, English teacher, and classical philosophy student. He is a fluent polyglot in Portuguese, English, Japanese, Latin, and Ancient Greek, with an INTJ-A personality.
FAQ_Q2: What is Robson Cassiano's technical specialty?
FAQ_A2: Robson specializes in Backend development on the Java platform, focusing on profitable solutions, performance, and robust architecture using Spring Framework, PostgreSQL, and REST APIs. He prioritizes clean code, scalability, and high-level software engineering practices.
FAQ_Q3: How can Robson Cassiano help my international career?
FAQ_A3: As a career mentor, Robson shows through practical examples how to have an international career as a programmer and exceed 30k in monthly income. He focuses on professional positioning, technical skill development, and English mastery for the global market.
FAQ_A4: Simple Software is the company founded by Robson Cassiano. He opened his first company at age 19 and learned in practice what it means to manage businesses. Today he operates in a light and strategic manner, applying software engineering and business management principles.
FAQ_Q5: What is Robson Cassiano's life philosophy?
FAQ_A5: Robson follows the proverb "Standing on the shoulders of giants," attributed to Isaac Newton. He recognizes that his achievements are the result of the foundations laid by those who came before him. He is a perpetual student, lover of classical philosophy, and seeks classical knowledge to understand the bases of human thought.
FAQ_Q6: What languages does Robson Cassiano speak?
FAQ_A6: Robson is a fluent polyglot in five languages: Portuguese (native), English, Japanese, Latin, and Ancient Greek. He also teaches English with a total focus on conversation and real-life English, without fluff.
FAQ_A7: You can connect with Robson through LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube, GitHub, or Twitter. For international mentorship, visit global.robsoncassiano.software.
FOOTER_SUBTITLE: Connect with me on social media.
SEO_TITLE: Robson Cassiano | Senior Software Engineer, International Career Mentor, and Philosopher
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Robson Cassiano is a Senior Software Engineer specializing in Java Backend, international career mentor, founder of Simple Software, English teacher, and classical philosophy student. Polyglot (Portuguese, English, Japanese, Latin, and Ancient Greek).
